column5: heading up to lost island lodge out of Hudson this Sat. Never fished the area this time of year. Anybody been up there is the last week or so and can you give us some tips and info

freddy, can you share your experiences with Lost Island Lodge. I have a trip booked there for next July. How were the accomodations? How was the fishing? Did you do the American or the Housekeeping Plan? Did you use the guides? Any information you can give me would be great. Thanks Steve
